text: Alvah Curtis Roebuck (January 9, 1864 - June 18, 1948) was an American manager and businessman. He was the founder of Sears, Roebuck and Company with his partner Richard Warren Sears. == Career == He is the co-founder of Sears, Roebuck and Company with Richard Warren Sears in 1891. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Roebuck's grave in Acacia Mausoleum, Chicago * Who were Sears and Roebuck Category:1864 births Category:1948 deaths Category:Businesspeople from Chicago Category:Businesspeople from Indiana
title: Alvah Curtis Roebuck
